remarks: Existential uniqueness via an indirect equality.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2010.)
statement:
euind.1 $e |- B e. _V $.
euind.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
euind.3 $e |- ( x = y -> A = B ) $.
euind $p |- ( ( A. x A. y ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> A = B ) /\ E. x ph ) -> E! z A. x ( ph -> z = A ) ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d B x z $.
$d ph y z $.
$d ps x z $.
$d x y z $.
